languages.text: "Шерин, я тут подумала. Нельзя просто бросить здесь эту... ксеноересь. Позвольте моим ребятам избавить вас от грязной работы, ну а я в долгу не останусь".

traits.locale_text: "Шерин, я тут подумала. Нельзя просто бросить здесь эту... ксено-ересь. Позвольте моим ребятам избавить вас от грязной работы, ну а я в долгу не останусь".

languages.text: "Shereen, I was thinking. We cannot just leave this... xenoheresy lying here. Allow my guys to do the heavy lifting, and I will owe you."
languages.original_text: "Шерин, я тут подумала. Нельзя просто бросить здесь эту... ксеноересь. Позвольте моим ребятам избавить вас от грязной работы, ну а я в долгу не останусь".

traits.locale_text: "Shereen, I was thinking. We cannot just leave this... xenoheresy lying here. Allow my blokes to do the heavy lifting, and I will owe you."
"Shereen, I was thinking. We cannot just leave this... xenoheresy lying here. Allow my blokes to do the heavy lifting, and I will owe you."
"Shereen, I was thinking. We cannot just leave this... xenoheresy lying here. Allow my blokes to do the heavy lifting, and I will owe you."
"Shereen, I was thinking. We cannot just leave this... xenoheresy lying here. Allow my blokes to do the heavy lifting, and I will owe you."
"Shereen, I was thinking. We cannot just leave this... xenoheresy lying here. Allow my blokes to do the heavy lifting, and I will owe you."

languages.text: 「シャリーン、あたし、考えていたの。この異種族の異端品を…このまま放っておくわけにはいかないわ。力仕事はあたしの部下に任させてちょうだい、お願いよ」
languages.original_text: "Shereen, I was thinking. We cannot just leave this... xenoheresy lying here. Allow my guys to do the heavy lifting, and I will owe you."

traits.locale_text: 「シャリーン、あたし、考えていたの。この異種族の異端品を…このまま放っておくわけにはいかないわ。力仕事はあたしの部下に任させてちょうだい、お願いよ」

languages.text: «Shereen, estaba pensando. No podemos dejar aquí toda esta... xenoherejía. Permita a mis muchachos que se hagan cargo de ella y estaré en deuda con usted».
languages.original_text: "Shereen, I was thinking. We cannot just leave this... xenoheresy lying here. Allow my guys to do the heavy lifting, and I will owe you."

traits.locale_text: «Shereen, estaba pensando. No podemos dejar aquí toda esta... xenoherejía. Permita a mis muchachos que se hagan cargo de ella y estaré en deuda con usted».

languages.text: “亲爱的，我在想，我们不能把这些……异形的东西就这么丢在这里。让我的伙计来把它们搬走吧，算我欠你一个人情。”
languages.original_text: "Shereen, I was thinking. We cannot just leave this... xenoheresy lying here. Allow my guys to do the heavy lifting, and I will owe you."

traits.locale_text: “亲爱的，我在想，我们不能把这些……异形的东西就这么丢在这里。让我的伙计来把它们搬走吧，算我欠你一个人情。”

languages.text: « Shereen, je me disais que nous ne pouvons laisser cette... xénohérésie traîner ici. Si vous permettez à mes gars de vous en débarrasser, je vous revaudrai ça. »
languages.original_text: "Shereen, I was thinking. We cannot just leave this... xenoheresy lying here. Allow my guys to do the heavy lifting, and I will owe you."

traits.locale_text: « Shereen, je me disais que nous ne pouvons laisser cette... xénohérésie traîner ici. Si vous permettez à mes gars de vous en débarrasser, je vous revaudrai ça. »

languages.text: "Shereen, ich habe nachgedacht. Wir können diese ... Xeno-Ketzerei nicht hier liegen lassen. Gestattet meinen Männern, die Schlepperei zu übernehmen, dann stehe ich in Eurer Schuld."
languages.original_text: "Shereen, I was thinking. We cannot just leave this... xenoheresy lying here. Allow my guys to do the heavy lifting, and I will owe you."

traits.locale_text: "Shereen, ich habe nachgedacht. Wir können diese ... Xeno-Ketzerei nicht hier liegen lassen. Gestattet meinen Männern, die Schlepperei zu übernehmen, dann stehe ich in Eurer Schuld."

languages.text: "Şirinim, aklıma geldi. Bunca zeno kâfirliğini burada öylece bırakamayız ya? Müsaadenle benimkiler işin zor kısmını halletsin, sana da borcum olsun."
languages.original_text: "Shereen, I was thinking. We cannot just leave this... xenoheresy lying here. Allow my guys to do the heavy lifting, and I will owe you."

traits.locale_text: "Şirinim, aklıma geldi. Bunca zeno kâfirliğini burada öylece bırakamayız ya? Müsaadenle benimkiler işin zor kısmını halletsin, sana da borcum olsun."
